synonyms.synonym: LIV-1 subfamily of ZIP zinc transporter 4

protein.general_function: Involved in metal ion transmembrane transporter activity
protein.specific_function: May mediate cellular uptake of nontransferrin-bound iron (By similarity). Broad-scope metal ion transporter with a preference for zinc uptake.
